title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When trying to close all saved files in the application, it is not functioning correctly.
OB: When selecting 'Close All Saved' from the 'File' menu, only some of the open files are closed and some remain open.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' function should close all open files that have been saved, leaving no open files in the application.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Open multiple files.
3. Create a new file called f1.txt.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the 'File' menu.
